info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Return a binary array with values from 'start value' from to 'stop value'.
[Parameters] - input measure type : not used. - output measure type : Ophidia typing. Supported types are: 'oph_double'; 'oph_float'; 'oph_long'; 'oph_int'; 'oph_short'; 'oph_byte'. - start value : first value. - stop value : max value; it cannot be lower than start value. - stride : step; it is set to 1 by default.
[Return type] Binary-array.
[Examples] Build an array of integers from 1 to 5: oph_get_index_array('','OPH_LONG',1,5)
